 D1DataXRDFMapper.RDFDataSet dataSetToRDF(DataSets ids)
          datasetToRDF convert the set of dataset ids to searchable RDF triples based on some rules It seems like a baseclass could handle some of these datasets need to allow classes to register valid rdf conversion for file types -- Have to know this if I want to map to an rdf vocabulary anyway

dataSetToRDF

public D1DataXRDFMapper.RDFDataSet dataSetToRDF(DataSets ids)
datasetToRDF convert the set of dataset ids to searchable RDF triples based on some rules It seems like a baseclass could handle some of these datasets need to allow classes to register valid rdf conversion for file types -- Have to know this if I want to map to an rdf vocabulary anyway
